attributes.action: put it to a legally binding referendum of the people before involving the country financially; economically or legally with any aspect of the Islamic Religion.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is offensive to christians for the government to involve the country with a religious organisation which is renowned to have Islamisation of the entire planet as its main aim, without first asking the people how they feel about it.  The active politicians of ths country are mainly of scottish heritage and should NOT be allowed to commit the English, the majority of the population, who have an entirely different heritage, into any undertaking with any religious organisation outside christianity.
